metadata.title: CVE-2017-14156 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The atyfb_ioctl function in drivers/video/fbdev/aty/atyfb_base.c in theLinux kernel through 4.12.10 does not initialize a certain data structure,which allows local users to obtain sensitive information from kernel stackmemory by reading locations associated with padding bytes.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14156` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.13.0-17-generic - 4.13.0-17.20
linux-image-4.13.0-17-generic-lpae - 4.13.0-17.20
linux-image-4.13.0-17-lowlatency - 4.13.0-17.20
linux-image-extra-4.13.0-17-generic - 4.13.0-17.20
No subscription required

linux-image-4.13.0-1006-raspi2 - 4.13.0-1006.6
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1001-aws - 4.15.0-1001.1
No subscription required
